TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Because sun.

How do they hide the sun underground every night?

They turn it off.

how do you polish a polish if a polish polish published a polished polish sausage

If you're so smart, why aint you rich?

Even a phone can be smart, but its money doesn't belong to it.

Why money in English is singular, while in Russian they are plural?

Because there are many Rubels to the Pound.

What do we do with a drunken sailor?

Shave his belly with butter late in the evening!

why eels?

115810072023

The eels are wondering, too.

is lamprey a lam prey or a lamp rey?

It is an L.A M.P named REY.

Don't care. The time is passing itself.

As there were knights, were there kdays?

No, the days were ladays (pronounced ladies)

to be ren-fair to turkeys.

I will say its the beauteous singing bucket!

?A snitch pitcher is a pitch snitcher, like the vamp teacher is a blood leecher.

125 Fished Fishes from Jeanne.(Don't ask where I came up with that, cause I just did randomly)

It doesn't matter for gorilla, as it can't hear the meowing of the cat.

How do the cats remember all letters of the "meow" they must pronounce?

They bought the letters of the word from the humans store

Why do I exist?

Because you think.

Why do we call squash squash, which is not easy to squash with bare hands, yet call a sponge sponge, which is very easy to squash with bare hands?

Because Squash Bob would look funny in square pants and would also bob to the top.

no, because you dont Wade in a Poole, you Wade in a pool
